title: Conspiracy Theory Colonization? The Newest Copaganda Campaign 1.28.22
itunes:title: Conspiracy Theory Colonization? The Newest Copaganda Campaign 1.28.22
description:
In episode 1073, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Caitlin Gill to discuss Is the second colonization of the Americas going to be an anti-vaxx one?, The Next Great Hype In The MSM Genre Of “We Need To Fund The Police Again”, Everybody Misses Blockbuster Video, Apparently and more!

  1. Is the second colonization of the Americas going to be an anti-vaxx one?
  2. The Next Great Hype In The MSM Genre Of “We Need To Fund The Police Again”
  3. Mental Health Experts Will Respond To Some Emergency Calls Instead Of Police As Part Of New Far North Side Program
  4. A Barber's Viral Pandemic Project: Turning His Basement Into a Video Store
  5. Georgia man creates 1980s era video store in basement
  6. This St. John's movie buff built a video store in his basement as his feature presentation
  7. World’s last Blockbuster more popular after Netflix show
  8. ‘Blockbuster’ Comedy Starring Randall Park a Go at Netflix
  9. A New DAO Wants To Buy Blockbuster And It Has One Key Supporter


Get Caitlin's T-Shirts Here: https://www.guaranteeshirts.com/

Follow: @RobotCaitlin @CaitlinIsTall

Listen: The Smoke by The Smile

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
